thread.title: "Bigger Stands Than Liverpool Arena?" Twitter gets creative with names for Everton's potential new stadium
thread.title_full: "Bigger Stands Than Liverpool Arena?" Twitter gets creative with names for Everton's potential new stadium

author: Jon Moody
title: "Bigger Stands Than Liverpool Arena?" Twitter gets creative with names for Everton's potential new stadium
text:
"Bigger Stands Than Liverpool Arena?" Twitter gets creative with names for Everton's potential new stadium The stadium may be a long way off yet, but that hasn't stopped fans offering their suggestions Share Will Everton be saying bye to Goodison? (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get daily   Could   
Reaction to a new stadium is always a mixed bag. 
Of course, you get those that are convinced the club moving is selling its soul by moving away from its home, in an effort to chase future fortunes both on and off the pitch. 
Then there's the group who immediately goad rivals for what will soon be their inferior stadium. 
Plus don't forget those that jump at the opportunity to suggest silly/sadly realistic names for the new digs as the club seek to recoup some of the construction costs back. Are Everton doing the off? (Photo: Mark Robinson) 
All those groups have clashed together in epic fashion on Twitter, as news develops that Everton are set to eventually move to a new stadium by Liverpool's Bramley Moore dock. 
When asked by fan groups for some name suggestions for Goodison Mk II, suggestions ranged from the funny to the farcical... One fan wanted to wind up Liverpool supporters: These were a mixed bag of suggestions: Some rival fans couldn't help himself: Some fans had a theory on what the Arteta transfer money was being spent on: This was genius: Those who have attended a game at Goodison will appreciate this: One supporter had a sadly accurate suggestion: What if Everton went all continental on us? Another Toffees fan couldn't help himself: This could be quite fitting: But the winner goes to... Everton fans: get these on sent a postcard to the club's board. You never know... poll loading Everton fans! Do you NEED a new stadium? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
